q2: How come Italy failed to qualify to World Cup 2018?
a2: Because they lost to Sweden in the qualifiers.
q3: But they are a good team .. why did they lose?
a3: Because their squad was filled with old players at the end of their careers.
q4: can Italy rebuild their team before the next world cup and qualify?
q5: Italy hasn't had time to build up new, strong players
a5: They didn't qualify for the last world cup so they should have enough time to overhaul the team
